speakers.name: Operator
speakers.dialogue: Good day everyone, and welcome to the Q1 2024 Legacy Sentiment earnings call.

speakers.name: Jordan Ellis
speakers.dialogue: Our revenue reached 125 million dollars, driven by strong gross merchandise value across the marketplace.

speakers.name: Morgan Patel
speakers.dialogue: We expanded adjusted EBITDA margins by 200 basis points year over year while maintaining disciplined operating expenses.

speakers.name: Jordan Ellis
speakers.dialogue: We launched new lending products through GoTo Financial and increased wallet share with enterprise customers.

speakers.name: Alex Kim
speakers.dialogue: Can you discuss expectations for free cash flow and capital expenditure in the second half of the year?

speakers.name: Morgan Patel
speakers.dialogue: We anticipate free cash flow to remain positive with capex focused on our logistics network upgrades.
